# Contributing to Spring Kafka Contract Starter

Thank you for considering contributing! ðŸ™Œ

## Ways to Contribute

- Report bugs
- Suggest features
- Improve documentation
- Submit Pull Requests

## Development Setup

### Requirements

- Java 21+
- Maven 3.9+
- Docker (for integration tests)
- Linux / macOS / Windows (via WSL recommended)

### Build & Test

```bash
mvn clean verify
